description: Aoi has just arrived in Tokyo for the first time, looking for her fiancée (whom she hasn`t seen since their childhood) to find out why their marriage arranged 18 years ago has been called off. Her sandal breaks but Kaoru kindly repairs the damage. Since they are going in the same direction, he agrees to be her escort but the address Aoi has for her fiancée turns out to be a vacant lot.
